channel.title: Carnage's Evolution [508]
channel.description:
Welcome to Carnage's Evolution.
After working on this for 7 months now, I'm ready to release it. Needless to say, this is a quality server.
Created by: King Lingerz (Carnage) Source: Massimo Server Other Source: Palidino76
Some pictures:
Logo:
http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Logo.jpg Starting: http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Starter.jpg Shops: http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Shops-1.jpg Trading: http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Trading.jpg Ancients: http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Ancients.jpg KBD http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/KBD.jpg KQ: http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/KQ.jpg Storylines http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Mole.jpg Dialogue http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/PlayerDialogue.jpg Barrows http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Dharok-1.jpg http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Killcount2.jpg Quests http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss325/Carnages_Evolution/Quests.jpg
[color=black]Features with no pics:
Working sound system (only missing a few) Couple of glitches NPC Aggression and following Barrows effects (need more work)
I have included a small anti-leech in here too . Experienced 508 programmers shouldn't have any trouble sorting it out, but for those who always need help, it's in Engine.java at the process part. [/color]
Download File:http://www.upload.ee/files/2481279/Carnages_Evolution.rar.html
